price: Kuma daga rãƙuma akwai nau'i biyu, kuma daga shãnu biyu; ka ce: Shin, mazan biyu ne Ya hana ko mãtan biyu Ya hana, kõ abin da mahaifar mãtan biyu suka tattara a kansa? Kõ kun kasance halarce ne a lõkacin da Allah Ya yi muku wasiyya da wannan? To, wãne ne mafi zãlunci daga wanda ya ƙirƙira ƙarya ga Allah, dõmin ya ɓatar da mutãne bã da wani ilmi ba? Lalle ne, Allah bã Ya shiryar da mutãne Azzãlumai.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلۡإِبِلِ ٱثۡنَيۡنِ وَمِنَ ٱلۡبَقَرِ ٱثۡنَيۡنِۗ قُلۡ ءَآلذَّكَرَيۡنِ حَرَّمَ أَمِ ٱلۡأُنثَيَيۡنِ أَمَّا ٱشۡتَمَلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ أَرۡحَامُ ٱلۡأُنثَيَيۡنِۖ أَمۡ كُنتُمۡ شُهَدَآءَ إِذۡ وَصَّىٰكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِهَٰذَاۚ فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا لِّيُضِلَّ ٱلنَّاسَ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
